sense.gloss: manzai, comic dialogue, two-person comedy act (usu. presented as a fast-paced dialogue, occ. presented as a skit)
vague, desultory, distracted, loose, half-hearted, diffuse, scattered
cartoonist, comic book artist, manga artist, manga author, mangaka
(nigh) impossible dream, adventurous spirit, epic adventure, great undertaking
in spite of oneself, somehow, without knowing why, vaguely
in full bloom, in full glory, glorious, luxuriant, splendid
